item.title: Weeds growing at base of wall, 11th February
item.description:
Weeds growing at base of wall along the perimeter wall of St Josephs Catholic Primary School. This is making the school look unkempt from the outside. Please can this be weeded / sprayed. Thank you

item.title: Dead fox middle of Green lane, 11th February
item.description:
A large fox has recently been run over and killed on Green Lane, roughly SE9 3TE. It's in the middle of the road. A distressing sight.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lane, Eltham

item.title: Tree planting request, 11th February

item.title: 95 Brondesbury villas, 11th February
item.description:
Leaves will end up in the drain opposite. The car was parked for 6 months and did the move. The car has gone. Can the leaves be taken please, so we are not flooded when it rains

item.title: Drainage issue, 11th February
item.description:
Resident has called to report a issue outside number 26 Willett close. Resident reports the road is on a slope. When it rains water is holding up in the area and causing it to flood. This is then flooding into the residents garden. Please can this be looked into.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willett Close, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged car abandoned for 6 Months, 11th February
item.description:
This damaged Citroen has been abandoned outside 124 Corbylands Road for 6 months, nobody has done anything with it. Please can it be removed, parking is very limited in this area at night.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 126, Corbylands Road, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
